content: > a welcome addition to any wardrobe this stylish jacket is a great compliment to finish the look you re going for finished measurements chest/bust 36 40 44 48 52 /91 5 101 5 112 122 132 cm gauge using i-9 5 5 mm hook 12 base chain/single_crochet = 4 /10 cm in v_stitch pattern 4 v s and 6 row of v s = 4 /10 cm as crocheted direct pdf link at yarnspirations 1 former link at caron http //caron com/projects/slip_stitch/ss_ss64w7_lacy_jacket html former link at michaels http //www michaels com/art/online/projectsheet pid=e06917&categoryid=29 1 https //s3 amazonaws com/spinrite/lacy+jacket+crochet%5b1%5d pdf
